job.title: Java API Integrations engineer - Europe only
job.description:
You are an experienced Software Engineer who is passionate about engineering practices like Agile, CI / CD, test-driven development, OOP concepts and solid principles. A SaaS class-leader is looking for talented individuals to help integrate their platform into 3rd party vendors and data suppliers.

You should have solid experience as an engineer designing, developing and maintaining API driven solutions, and have a strong understanding of how a microservice architecture works, as well as implementing and designing RESTful and SOAP APIs with data transformation.

You have strong communication skills, high integrity and great attention to detail who is happy working in a remote team, alone, or together in a group.

You will have the opportunity to learn and work primarily with the following technologies:

● Java with Spring Boot
● AWS Gateway Services, Lamba serverless, AWS Fargate
● PostgreSQL
● EKS, Kubernetes, Docker
● JSON, VTL, XML
● Fluency in English
You will also interact with the rest of our stack, which includes
● C# with .net and .net core
● MSSQL
● Looker via Redshift
● AWS PaaS offerings
● Terraform
● Datadog Monitoring and Observability

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a Java API Integrations engineer to join our team for a 3 to 6-month project. The ideal candidate will have strong experience working with various API integrations, including SOAP and RESTful APIs. Proficiency in AWS Lambda and Java is also required.

As an API Integration engineer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining API integrations for our platform. This includes designing, implementing, and testing APIs to ensure seamless integration with external systems. You will work closely with our development team to understand requirements and ensure the successful implementation of API integrations.

To apply for this position, please submit a proposal outlining your relevant experience and how you can contribute to this project. Please include links to past completed projects that demonstrate your API integration skills. We look forward to reviewing your proposal and discussing further details with you.
